functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Casting Lab 02 Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"While Ixinik\'s casting division perched","color":"gray"}','{"text":"their laboratory in plain view of the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"city of Tyre, New Hoiro\'s Subjugate","color":"gray"}','{"text":"hid their\'s where no one could see","color":"gray"}','{"text":"their malevolent methods.","color":"gray"}']}}
